nodes.text: The M4-I6 Astromech Droid was a type of small astromech droid available during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.
The M4-I6 Astromech Droid was a gift given to all players through their mailbox in Star Wars: The Old Republic as a gift for Star Wars Day starting on May 4, 2016.
